text: Ate jel'ha vica usa de nala do hora naujavana dakhila ho'e. Usa vicom ika ne ika dina kiha ki maim supane vica dekhada ham ki mai' saraba kadha riha ham ate duje ne kiha ki maim supane vica dekhada ham ki maim apane sira upara roti cuki ho'i hai. Jisa nu ciri'am kha rahi'am hana sanu isada aratha dasom. Asim samajhade ham ki tusim cage lokam vicom ho
